檥字的基本解释

檥
yǐ
同“舣”。

檥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǐ］
［《廣韻》魚倚切，上紙，疑。］
［《集韻》魚羈切，平支，疑。］
(1)立木。
(2)使船靠岸。参见“檥船”、“檥舟”。

檥字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　檥； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页557第25
【唐韻】【韻會】?魚倚切，音蟻。或作艤。【類篇】附船著岸也。【史記·項羽紀】烏江亭長檥舟待項羽。【應劭曰】檥，正也。孟康曰：檥，附也。○按《正韻》養里切，音以，非。　又【集韻】牛何切，音莪。義同。　又【集韻】魚羈切【韻會】疑羈切，?音宜。【說文】榦也。一曰立木以表物。　又【正韻】延知切，音夷。義同。　本作〈木䕏〉，俗省作檥。

檥字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
檥字的起名意思

指一种常绿乔木,树皮和果实可入药。

Cockpit
Basic explanation of words
Cockpit
yǐ
Same as "clothes".
Cockpit
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yǐ］
["Guangyun" fish leans on the cut, puts on the paper, suspicious. ]
["Jiyun" fish cut, flat branch, suspicious. ]
(1) Standing timber.
(2) Bring the ship to shore. See "Haute Boat", "Haute Boat".
Cockpit
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　舣; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 557 25
[Tang Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Fish lean on cut, sound ants. Or as an outfit. [Classes] Attached to the ship to the shore. [Historical Records·Xiang Yuji] Wujiang Pavilion Long Boat Waiting for Xiang Yu. [Ying Shao said] Fu, Zheng Ye. Meng Kang said: 舣, also attached. ○According to "Zheng Yun" to raise the inside and cut, the sound is in, and not.　[Jiyun] Niu Heqie, Yin E. The same meaning.　 [Ji Yun] Yu Zhi cut [Yun Hui] Suspicious cut,? The sound is appropriate. [Said Wen] Do it. One is standing wood as a surface object.　[Zheng Yun] Yan Zhiqie, Yinyi. The same meaning.　This work is "Wood Pi", which is made by the province.

Refers to an evergreen tree whose bark and fruit can be used as medicine.
